ingredients: 1½ c Carnaroli rice or Arborio rice
4-5 c organic chicken stock – low sodium
1 tbs extra virgin olive oil for finishing the dish
½ lb fresh chorizo sausage – cut into 1 inch pieces
1 lb jumbo shrimp- cleaned, peeled wt tails on
1 c frozen green peas – heated through in the saffron infused stock
½ c sun dried tomatoes -re-hydrated or marinated, chopped
3 tbs flat leaf Italian Parsley or cilantro – roughly chopped
